title: Cross-browser compatibility
content: Chrome, Firefox, IE, Safari, Opera, Microsoft Edge - MDB loves all browsers; all browsers love MDB.

title: Frequent update
content: MDB becomes better every month. We love the project and enhance as much as possible.

title: Active community
content: Our society grows day by day. Visit our forum and check how it is to be a part of our family.

title: jQuery 3.x
content: MDB is integrated with newest jQuery. Therefore you can use all the latest features which come along with it.

title: Modularity
content: Material Design for Bootstrap comes with both, compiled, ready to use libraries including all features as well as modules for CSS (SASS files) and JS

title: Technical support
content: We care about reliability. If you have any questions - do not hesitate to contact us.

title: Flexbox
content: MDB fully supports Flex Box. You can forget about alignment issues.

title: SASS files
content: Arranged and well documented .scss files can't wait until you compile them.
